member.name: M:SettingsManager.WebApi.Controllers.SettingsController.Import(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.IFormFile)
member.summary: Uploads, parses, and saves settings from the legacy format.
member.returns: A result of the import process

member.name: M:SettingsManager.WebApi.Controllers.SettingsController.SetSetting(System.String,SettingsManager.Common.Settings.SettingDataType,System.String)
member.summary: Sets a setting from a string value.
member.param: A key to uniquely identify a setting. A key must follow the prescribed format of Group.Group.Group.Key
The type of value being saved
The string representation of the value

member.name: M:SettingsManager.WebApi.Controllers.SettingsController.GetSetting(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a setting by key. It will always return the string serialized version of the value.
member.param: A key to uniquely identify a setting. A key must follow the prescribed format of Group.Group.Group.Key

member.name: M:SettingsManager.WebApi.Controllers.SettingsController.GetHostSettings
member.summary: Gets a structured representation of the HostSettings collection of settings.

member.name: M:SettingsManager.WebApi.Controllers.SettingsController.GetClientSettings
member.summary: Gets a structured representation of the ProductClientSettings collection of settings.

member.name: M:SettingsManager.WebApi.Controllers.SettingsController.GetEmailSettings
member.summary: Gets a structured representation of the EmailConfiguration collection of settings.

member.name: M:SettingsManager.WebApi.Controllers.SettingsController.GetSettingsInGroup(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a list of settings that are in a group and optionally of a group. By default, it will return child groups as well.
member.param: The group key or portion thereof to use in the query
Decides if it must be in a specific group, or include subgroups
